articles.author: Daniel Wu
articles.title: Va. firm fined for discriminatory hiring ad that only sought White citizens - The Washington Post
articles.description: Arthur Grand Technologies, an IT firm based in Ashburn, Va., will pay more than $38,000 in penalties for a job ad that sought only White U.S. citizens.
articles.content: A Virginia-based technology company will pay more than $38,000 in penaltiesfor posting a discriminatory job advertisement that only sought to hire White U.S. citizens, the Justice Department announce… [+478 chars]

articles.title: Iyo thinks its gen AI earbuds can succeed where Humane and Rabbit stumbled - TechCrunch
articles.description: Iyo represents a third form factor in the push to deliver standalone generative AI devices: Bluetooth earbuds.
articles.content: A month after launching its first product, Humanes co-founders have reportedly put their well-funded startup on the market. While even the firms biggest cheerleaders didnt expect the Ai Pin to change… [+5608 chars]
